scripts.start: export $(cat .env.prod | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/server start
scripts.build-web: export $(cat .env.prod | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/web build
scripts.dev-web: export $(cat .env.dev | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/web dev
scripts.dev-server: export $(cat .env.dev | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/server dev
scripts.init-mysql-db-dev: export $(cat .env.dev | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/backend-core init-mysql-db
scripts.cleanup-mysql-db-dev: export $(cat .env.dev | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/backend-core cleanup-mysql-db
scripts.init-mysql-db-prod: export $(cat .env.prod | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/backend-core init-mysql-db
scripts.cleanup-mysql-db-prod: export $(cat .env.prod | grep -v "#" | xargs) && yarn workspace @iremono/backend-core cleanup-mysql-db
